decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the outbuilding hereby permitted shall be those specified within the application form.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location plan, Site Block Plan and SA290815EE Rev 0 received on 06/11/2015. SA290815PE Rev 1, SA290815R Rev 1, SA290815P Rev 2 and Site Block Plan received on 21/12/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the outbuilding hereby approved and no additional doors shall be inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The window formed in the side elevation (facing no. 265) shall be fitted with fixed pane (non-opening) obscure glazing, and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 6 - The building hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes incidental to the residential use of the dwelling known as 263 Uxbridge Road.

Condition : 7 - Prior to the first beneficial use of the outbuilding hereby approved an opaque privacy screen or bourndary treatment measuring 1.8m in height, above ground level, shall be erected along the length of the boundary between the outbuilding and the neighbouring property at no. 261 Uxbridge Road. This screen shall not be removed or altered in height without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a single storey outbuilding at the rear garden of the house
